addComposeHash(bytes32).details: MUST emit ComposeHashAdded event on success      MUST revert if caller is not authorized

addDevice(bytes32).details: MUST emit DeviceAdded event on success      MUST revert if caller is not authorized

removeComposeHash(bytes32).details: MUST emit ComposeHashRemoved event on success      MUST revert if caller is not authorized

removeDevice(bytes32).details: MUST emit DeviceRemoved event on success      MUST revert if caller is not authorized

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

addComposeHash(bytes32).notice: Add a compose hash to the allowed list

addDevice(bytes32).notice: Add a device ID to the allowed list

removeComposeHash(bytes32).notice: Remove a compose hash from the allowed list

removeDevice(bytes32).notice: Remove a device ID from the allowed list

documentation.text:
@notice Emitted when a new compose hash is added to the allowed list
 @param composeHash The compose hash that was added

@notice Emitted when a compose hash is removed from the allowed list
 @param composeHash The compose hash that was removed

@notice Emitted when a new device ID is added to the allowed list
 @param deviceId The device ID that was added

@notice Emitted when a device ID is removed from the allowed list
 @param deviceId The device ID that was removed
